EXPERIENCE SUMMARY 
• 
I read requirements, creating test case and discuss product owner (PO) to analysis this 
document from Client sent. Good communication Client and PO to resolve issue. Suggest 
solution and develop software. And have an experience discuss with developer to fixing 
bug and resolve big issue 
• 
A lot of experience in managing team during some projects 
• 
Spend more than 4 years making apps, game on mobile, 3 years working as a software 
tester 
• 
Broad understanding of testing processes, creating test case, smoke test, integration 
testing, system testing, acceptance testing and checking GUI. 
In Automation: 
• 
I created a framework to run automation by protractor in javaScript that can run all browser 
on website. It writes cucumber and report format cucumber report 
• 
Broad understanding of Selenium IDE (create test case and test suite: record and play 
back), checking UI of module function. Have an experience cucumber  
• 
Knowledge about Selenium WebDriver: API, Maven. Creating a framework (try catch, log4j, 
test NG, run some browsers), run API by JavaScript, run groups test case, parallel, data 
provider, parameters …  by Test NG  
• 
Run automation on app and web mobile via (APPIUM, Android studio, X-code) 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Automation testing and manual testing (Front End and Back End): 
10/2018– Now check manual and automation 
Project Description:  
• 
This project is manual testing and automation for website. The project name is MyDTI 
• 
Create test case and test plan which are checked testcase for this project. Then I write script 
to automation testing by protractor that is cover 80% testcase manual. And find bug quickly 
when running automation. 
Responsibilities : 
• 
Analyze manual test cases and write automation 
• 
Check API and response from request to server  
-------------- 
02/2018– 09/2018 
Project Description:  
• 
This project is manual testing and automation for backend server. The project name is Bank

Get document from developer then create database push to server and created Request API 
follow this document by Postman and SOAP UI 
Responsibilities : 
• 
Analyze manual test cases and write automation

This project is manual testing for app Android mobile, IOS mobile. The project name is SEKIO 
that runs android mobile, IOS. Executing some devices with other resolution (480*1200) and 
OS (5.11, 6x, 7.0, 7.1) and creating 355 test cases for testing. After automation testing app by 
APPIUM to run 355 test cases for Android and IOS 
• 
BTW, another project about website: Writing test case and run automation with selenium 
using cucumber framework (run multi browser Firefox, Chrome, IE). 
• 
Research run protractor with Angular-2 and coding with visual code (ng serve, ng e2e) 
that is a new feature for automation 
Responsibilities : 
• 
Analyze manual test cases and automation test  
• 
Create test case and create package to automation test 
• 
Integration and System testing 
-------------- 
07/2016 – 01/2017 
Project Description:  
• 
This project is manual testing for device (Panasonic project). Panasonic project is executing 
the testing on device and applying testing for door phone following business rules, test case 
list. 
Responsibilities : 
• 
Analyze manual test cases 
• 
Create test case 
• 
Integration and System testing 
-------------- 
04/2016 –07/2016 
Project Description: 
• 
This project is to automate all manual TCs for DLS project. DLS is the system receiving Guide 
Data from various sources (Scheduling System, Gracenote, …) and publishing the Guide data 
to downstream systems (PGWS, …) following business rules 
Responsibilities:  
• 
Analyze manual test cases 
• 
Create sub-process in LISA 
• 
Automate TCs by LISA’s tool  
-------------- 
12/2015 - 04/2016, Manual Web service tester 
Project Description: 
• 
Program Guide RESTful Web Services (PGWS) shall provide the clients with the up to date 
program guide information that matches the client’s search request on Mobile/dotcom 
• 
Program Data Service (PDS) web service is the system which provides data for specific 
settopbox UI screen. The data, which is provided by PDS, includes Content metadata 
(Movies/Show with scheduled program details or VOD information), Celebrity and Provider 
information. The service allows more than 100.000 titles metadata and real time updated 
information to be delivered to customer. 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Integration and System testing 
• 
Analyze/Create bug report 
-------------- 
10/2014 - 11/2015, Mobile application tester 
Project Description:  
• 
Develop and verify software for IVI system which will be deployed on electric cars or hybrid 
cars. This software provides lots of features, such as: multimedia, radio, apple car plays, 
mirror link, climate, and lots of settings...   
Responsibilities: 
• 
Analyze requirement to develop test cases 
• 
Set up simulator for device (car) and install application on mobile by ITunes 
• 
Functional/Integration/Free testing for application on simulator and on mobile 
• 
Testing the interaction between 2 applications on simulator and mobile  
• 
Bug reporting and tracking 
• 
Develop test to complete report for each build 
----------- 
10/2014 - 11/2015, Manual Tester 
Project Description: 
 DLS is the system receiving Guide Data from various sources (Scheduling System, Gracenote, 
…) and publishing the Guide data to downstream systems (PGWS, PDS …) following 
business rules 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Functional Testing 
• 
Bug reporting and tracking 
Technologies Used: Web Services, FTP 
------------------ 
06/2014– 10/2014, Manual Tester 
Project Description: This project is for router firmware testing 
• 
Check authentication of system, limitation about access users into one website 
• 
Configure DNS, IP address, domain and sub-domain 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Analyze requirement to develop test plan/test cases 
• 
Functional testing 
• 
Communicate with QA manager in US to clarify Q&A, log and track bugs 
• 
Create test report after each release 
----------------- 
3/2012– 08/2014, Manual Tester 
Project description: Testing some game apps for mobile such as Green farm, Little Big City, Littlest 
Pet Shop, Wonder Zoo and Dragon Mania… 
• 
It must be free of bugs, correctly localization display and IAP (In-App-Purchase) buy item and 
receive item is correct  
• 
 Compatibility with more than 300 mobiles and tablet devices. Testing game on platform IOS, 
Android, Blackberry, Nokia 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Write test case, create project plan 
• 
Execute testing game, log and track bugs
